title: Centipede Cassiopeia (skin concept)
body:
So I thought this would be a nice addition to Cassiopeia, centipedes are also toxic. I just basically took the idea from Inuyasha, where there is a Centipede woman that reminds me of Cassiopeia. I think it would  be quite cool. 

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/inuyasha/images/8/83/Mujer_cienpies_persiguiendo_a_kagome.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110728185652&path-prefix=es
